r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Fix bug #47408: Same image directory used for each theme (Christian) - Fix bug #47413: pear themes don't work when rendered together at once (Christian) - Change copyright year to 2007-2009 (Christian) - Fix PEAR chm manual title for french (Laurent) - Fix PEAR chm navbar alignment (Laurent)
